name: Dungeon Pets
description:
Get ready to explore infinity dungeons with your favorite digital pets. Take care and train your Dunpets to fight against terrible monsters that have stolen their eggs and discover more than 60 kinds of this magical creatures.

Features
- Discover more than 60 Dunpet kinds. Over 200 creature forms!
- Take care of your creatures and train everyday to make them stronger.
- Complete the adventure mode and discover lots of secrets.
- Compete in Game Center leaderboards and get 64 achievements.
- Exchange Dunpets with you friends.
- Explore unique dungeons everyday: Dungeon Pets is a powerful roguelike game!
- Fight monsters in RPG battles: fast but challenging.
- Customize your game user interface and extend your refuge to take care of more Dunpets.
- Revive the nostalgia of digital pet devices with pixelated screen in black and white.
- Available in English and Spanish.
